title: Text setup guide in nav
summary: Does add a setup guide nav item, for those eligible, increase engagement? Yes, it does.
hypothesis: We believe that adding a navigation item dedicated to the SMS Setup Guide for all companies that are eligible for the SMS Guide will result in a lift in nav-based setup engagement, and increase SMS verification and consent task completion because of the improved visibility and access to the setup guide. We will measure success using New SMS Sends, and monitor New SMS Consents, New SMS Flows, and New SMS Campaigns to ensure no negative impact.
control_description: Tested across 289,764 accounts, with 145,366 accounts exposed to the control condition.
treatment_description: Tested across 289,764 accounts, with 144,398 accounts exposed to the control condition.
